Name: Mohammad Khalid, Civilian Complaint Review Board
Title: Resolution pursuant to Rule 10.60 of the Rules of the Council and Section 440 of the New York City Charter, approving the appointment by the Council of Dr. Mohammad Khalid, a resident of Staten Island, to the Civilian Complaint Review Board.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
